ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
¼ cup canned green chile peppers

gear.name: Loaf pan or round baking dish

cookingTips: Fold in cheese and chiles gently to maintain the bread's airy structure
Brush the warm bread with melted butter immediately after baking for a golden crust
This savory version pairs well with chili or hearty soups
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook see this as a versatile base: cheese and chiles make it a savory side bread that complements robust main dishes.
